keyword: how many calories in a pop tart
title: How Many Calories in a Pop Tart?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a pop tart, including full nutrition breakdown like carbs, protein, fat, and easy tweaks for different flavors.
h1: How Many Calories in a Pop Tart?
assumptions: Standard frosted Pop-Tart (e.g., strawberry flavor), one pastry (52g), unprepared or toasted without additions.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor, brand, frosting type, and serving size. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One standard frosted Pop-Tart contains about 200 calories.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one frosted Pop-Tart?
faqs.a: Approximately 200 calories for a standard frosted flavor.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Pop-Tart?
faqs.a: About 37g of carbs, including 16g sugars and 1g fiber per pastry.

faqs.q: Do Pop-Tarts have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Roughly 2g protein and 5g total fat (2g saturated) per Pop-Tart.

faqs.q: How does flavor affect calories in Pop-Tarts?
faqs.a: Most flavors are similar at ~200 kcal, but filled or special editions may vary by 10-20 kcal.

faqs.q: Are unfrosted Pop-Tarts lower in calories?
faqs.a: Yes, unfrosted versions typically have 20-30 fewer calories than frosted ones.
